sample id of critetion (like A).name: sample criterion name
sample id of critetion (like A).max_mark: summary of marks of this criterion

sample id of sub criterion (like 1).name: sample sub criterion name
sample id of sub criterion (like 1).max_mark: summary of marks of this sub criterion

sample id of aspect (like 1).name: sample aspect name
sample id of aspect (like 1).type: type of aspect. type can be 'jmespath','webrequest'. 'jmespath'. checking resource availability or property using jmespath. 'jmespath' must have field 'filterForReseachInResourse'. 'webrequest'- checking if the website is responding. 'webrequest' must have field 'nameAnswer'.

sample id of aspect (like 2).name: sample aspect name
sample id of aspect (like 2).type: type of aspect. type can be 'jmespath','webrequest'. 'jmespath'. checking resource availability or property using jmespath. 'jmespath' must have field 'filterForReseachInResourse'. 'webrequest'- checking if the website is responding. 'webrequest' must have field 'nameAnswer'.
